Agenda VIRTUALIZATION ● What is virtualization? ● Virtual machine ● Data center ● Server & clients ● Types of server
What is virtualization ? Running multiple virtual machine in a physical computer is called virtualization.
It is type of computer runs in a physical machine is called virtual machine. VIRTUAL MACHINE
DATA CENTER It is group & collection of server in a building called data center.
SERVER & CLIENT Server: It is used to offer the services. Client: It is used to access the services.
Types of servers(services): ● Web server -( web page…..,) ● File server-( files,download folder….,) ● Mail server-( mail,gmail,yahoo….,) ● App server-( playstore,app store….., )
